p.b: The exponential growth in popularity of Gentoo Linux (as evidenced by Novell.com poll where Gentoo Linux ranks second in popularity only to Red Hat) has certainly created its own set of challenges for our project.

body.p: To address these challenges, Gentoo needs to get organized. Thus, a new proposed management structure (in draft form) has been created, and is available online for public review. This new management structure, once formalized, will allow Gentoo to adapt to the challenges of continued rapid growth while ensuring greater accountability to and communication with its various user communities.
Please also read this gentoo-dev mailing list post which may help address questions you may have about this new proposed management structure.
